name: Cuppa Random- A Coffee Themed D&D Item
name_original: Cuppa Random- A Coffee Themed D&D Item
description:
The following D&D 5e content was made for Dvaleris' 2022 Coffee And Tea Jam

Compatible with D&D 5e, Cuppa Random is a cursed item that causes interesting affects to the character who dares to drink it.

Cover photo by Ante Samarzija on UnSplash | Edited by Scarlet Noble
